items.value: MrBeast's default room. Has nothing interesting except its visuals and a different color on the map.
MrBeast's very important Credit Card. He usually leaves it in a random spot but may not if you decide to place it in weird places.
Simple duplicate of "Quarter" item but named by other name. Just if anybody wants to have a quarter named "Beast Quarter", it is here.
Stop 1 NPC in your way for 15 seconds! Comes with only 1 ammo, enough for one npc. The worst one.
Stop some enemies in your way for 15 seconds. Comes with 2 ammo. Good but can be better if it had more ammo.
Stop half of enemies in your way for 15 seconds with 3 ammo. A medium one, enough for ~4 npcs.
Stop most of enemies in your way for 15 seconds with 4 ammo. Almost full.
Stop anything for entire 15 seconds with 5 AMMO! Fully full.
